data: TM Factor Replacement Hemophilia w/ inhibitors (NiaStase / Factor Vlla / FEIBA) (Module)
50 mL, IV, as directed, PRN other (see comment), drug form: bag
Orders expire 5 days from order date and time
Indication is hemophilia with known inhibitor. For all other indications, contact TM for approval prior to ordering
Products expire 3 hours from reconstitution. Confirm dose times with TM. Product will not be reconstituted until patient is ready for transfusion
